summary:
Australia's men's cricket team is one of the best in the world. They've been playing Test cricket since 1877 and won many matches. As of May 2022, they're ranked first in the world for Test matches. They hold records for most wins and have won the ICC World Test Championship.

In One-Day Internationals (ODIs), Australia is also a powerhouse, winning six Cricket World Cups, the most of any team. They've achieved over 600 ODI wins and were the first to reach four straight World Cup finals.

In Twenty20 Internationals, Australia won the 2021 World Cup. They've played over 200 matches, showing their strength in all cricket formats.
title: Australia national cricket team
